Unique Textured Wipes — The two sides of the dog dental care wipes are different. One side add friction particles to make physical scrub to clean teeth more powerfully. One side is textured, soft and clean the gums without hurt.
REACH TO BACK TEETH FOR DEEP CLEAN –These dental care finger wipes will make cleaning your dog’s teeth so much easier than gauze or finger brushes. It’s slimmer, so it slides easily between the dogs cheeks and teeth, allows you to reach & feel each tooth and won’t slip off your finger.
PORTABLE & EASY TO USE — Just take out a dog teeth cleaning wipes wipes and sleeve on finger. Then wipe teeth and gum in circle motion. Presoaked wipes don’t need more steps, so it’s convenient to use anywhere, such as home, park, road trip, picnic ,etc. 100pcs Disposable wipes is enough for a long time.
UNSCENTED & SAFE — Our dog dental care wipes is unscented. No need to worry that pets hate to use it because of strange smell. (Please screw the lids tight after use.)

Easy and convenient way to clean pets teeth


Comprehensive care for pet’s oral health

CLEAN TEETH AND GUM

Dog teeth cleaning wipes can effectively remove plaque and tartar.

Prevent plaque and tartar built-up, freshen breath.

EASY TO USE

The design of the finger cover makes cleaning teeth easier,

No brushing, no toothpaste, no mess .

SAFE AND EFFECTIVE

Two different textured wipes to effectively clean pet’s teeth.

Safe for dogs and cats.

UNIVERSAL FOR DOGS AND CATS

Our finger wipes are suitable for all breeds and sizes of pets.

Safe and effective to clean the teeth and gums without hurt.

item.title: Breath: The New Science of a Lost Art
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) A New York Times Bestseller A Washington Post Notable Nonfiction Book of 2020 Named a Best Book of 2020 by NPR   “A fascinating scientific, cultural, spiritual and evolutionary history of the way humans breathe—and how we’ve all been doing it wrong for a long, long time.” —Elizabeth Gilbert, author ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:26:31 UTC – Details)


A New York Times Bestseller

A Washington Post Notable Nonfiction Book of 2020

Named a Best Book of 2020 by NPR
 
“A fascinating scientific, cultural, spiritual and evolutionary history of the way humans breathe—and how we’ve all been doing it wrong for a long, long time.” —Elizabeth Gilbert, author of Big Magic and Eat Pray Love

No matter what you eat, how much you exercise, how skinny or young or wise you are, none of it matters if you’re not breathing properly.

There is nothing more essential to our health and well-being than breathing: take air in, let it out, repeat twenty-five thousand times a day. Yet, as a species, humans have lost the ability to breathe correctly, with grave consequences.

Journalist James Nestor travels the world to figure out what went wrong and how to fix it. The answers aren’t found in pulmonology labs, as we might expect, but in the muddy digs of ancient burial sites, secret Soviet facilities, New Jersey choir schools, and the smoggy streets of São Paulo. Nestor tracks down men and women exploring the hidden science behind ancient breathing practices like Pranayama, Sudarshan Kriya, and Tummo and teams up with pulmonary tinkerers to scientifically test long-held beliefs about how we breathe.

Modern research is showing us that making even slight adjustments to the way we inhale and exhale can jump-start athletic performance; rejuvenate internal organs; halt snoring, asthma, and autoimmune disease; and even straighten scoliotic spines. None of this should be possible, and yet it is.

Drawing on thousands of years of medical texts and recent cutting-edge studies in pulmonology, psychology, biochemistry, and human physiology, Breath turns the conventional wisdom of what we thought we knew about our most basic biological function on its head. You will never breathe the same again.

From the Publisher

item.title: SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablet with Fluoride – Camping Travel Hiking Backpacking – Vegan Natural Ingredient – White Teeth, Fresh Breath (Peppermint) (60 Count (Pack of 1))
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Freshen Your Breath Wherever You Go Bringing tubes of toothpaste when you travel can be a hassle. Needing to put them into clear zipper bags for airport security? Or how about those tubes being squished and exploding all over your luggage. Either way, a day spent being hassled ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.98
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:37:49 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Freshen Your Breath Wherever You Go

Bringing tubes of toothpaste when you travel can be a hassle. Needing to put them into clear zipper bags for airport security? Or how about those tubes being squished and exploding all over your luggage.

Either way, a day spent being hassled by screening officers or washing off exploded dried toothpaste from your clothes is surely not how you intend to travel. With SIMPLUT’s toothpaste tablets, you can travel freely and have fresh breath and clean teeth no matter where you are in the world.

Exceptional Dental Care Without Harsh Chemicals

We think of toothpaste as great for the teeth. And they are—aside from the many out there that contain chemicals harmful to our health and well-being in the long run.

Our toothpaste tablets taste good and are naturally flavored with Xylitol, sage, and green tea extracts. Paraben-free, these tabs also contain Vitamins B6, E, C, and fluoride for better dental health.

Sustainable Oral Care Solution

Making the switch to zero-waste living or just wanting to try out a product that’ll redefine the way you use toothpaste? 100% plastic-free, SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets come in a tin case that lets you get the most out of portable toothpaste. Take one tablet, chew, and brush. No more squeezing that last bit of toothpaste from a tube.

keep your teeth healthy With Chewable Toothpaste

Keep your teeth healthy and away from plaque and cavities while keeping your breath fresh. SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets contain fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel. Other toothpaste tablets don’t contain fluoride, which means that your teeth aren’t getting the protection they need to stay healthy.

Suitable for Vegans Too

SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets are made only with plant-based ingredients. These peppermint-flavored tablets do not contain any raw animal substances and are never tested on animals. Gluten-free, SIMPLUT toothpaste is also recognized by “Wasteless Design”, a certification given to products that reduce your carbon footprint through plastic-free packaging.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.95 x 2.87 x 1.18 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ sl001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SIMPLUT
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07RLNKLP8

EASY TO USE: The mouthwash tablets are incredibly easy to use. Take a tablet or two, chew it a few times, and brush away! The micro particles will clean your teeth, and whiten your teeth.
MINIMAL CHEMICAL USE: Our flavored toothpaste tablets contain Vitamins B6, E, C, Xylitol, aloe extract and fluoride, without any parabens or sulphates. These tablets provide best possible dental care while using the least amount of chemicals possible.

Read more

Read more
